remarks: Closure of a finite sum of complex numbers ` A ( k ) ` .  A version of ~ fsumcl using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
fsumclf.ph $e |- F/ k ph $.
fsumclf.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fsumclf.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fsumclf $p |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A B e. CC ) $.
$d A k $.
